TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerSerializerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerSerializerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DesignerSerializerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示某个序列化管理器的序列化程序，它将用于序列化此特性所应用到的类型的值。

span.span: Indicates a serializer for the serialization manager to use to serialize the values of the type this attribute is applied to.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使您能够向设计器的序列化管理器指示序列化对象的值时，应使用特定类型的序列化程序。 provides a way to indicate to the designer serialization manager that a specific type of serializer should be used when serializing the values of an object. 这允许你指定的序列化程序能够自定义的类型，例如序列。This allows you to specify a serializer that is capable of serializing a custom type, for instance. 将此特性置于类，以指示要在序列化类时使用的序列化对象。Place this attribute on a class to indicate the serialization object to use when serializing the class. ## Examples 下面的代码使用若要将一个示例序列化程序与示例组件相关联。The following code uses a to associate an example serializer with an example component. [!code-cpp[DesignerSerializerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerSerializerAttribute/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerSerializerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerSerializerAttribute/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerSerializerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerSerializerAttribute/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: serializerTypeName
param.span: 序列化程序的数据类型的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the data type of the serializer.

param.name: baseSerializerTypeName
param.span: 序列化程序的基数据类型的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the base data type of the serializer.

param.span: 只要序列化程序具有不同的基类型，就可以为一个类提供多个序列化程序。

span.span: Multiple serializers can be supplied for a class as long as the serializers have different base types.

summary.span: 指示此特性类型的唯一 ID。

span.span: Indicates a unique ID for this attribute type.

value.span: 此特性类型的唯一 ID。

span.span: A unique ID for this attribute type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过筛选算法使用此 ID 来标识具有相同的类型的两个属性。This ID is used by filtering algorithms to identify two attributes that are the same type. 对于大多数属性，这只返回属性的实例。For most attributes, this just returns the instance for the attribute. 重写此特性以包含编辑器基类型的类型。 overrides this to include the type of the editor base type.
